page.title: 06A MINISTER'S DAY
page.content: Mr.Maclean told us on Tuesday about how he spends his day.He takes a day off anytime he likes.He has a very long working day. In the mornings he usually visits old people and goes to schools. At about 7am he goes into his study and reads his Bible. Often he has to go to Edinburgh for conferences. He told us about his most embarrasing moment.It was when he did a marriage, the bride fainted and he blushed. He had to try and lift her up. He has to do funerals, christenings, and sometimes he is faced with a problem. He will only do a marriage if they have a licence.He is going to appear on "Reflections" in August.{
